mapper.sql: USER_ID, PAY_PSW, IS_USE_PAY_PSW, COUNT_INVALID_PWD, PWD_STRENGTH, PAY_BASE_KEY, PAY_PSW_TYPE, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, ACCT_STATE, REAL_NAME, EMAILL, MOBILE, REAL_CHECK, REG_IP, REG_TIME, COMPANY_NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_USER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_USER (USER_ID, PAY_PSW, IS_USE_PAY_PSW, COUNT_INVALID_PWD, PWD_STRENGTH, PAY_BASE_KEY, PAY_PSW_TYPE, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, ACCT_STATE, REAL_NAME, EMAILL, MOBILE, REAL_CHECK, REG_IP, REG_TIME, COMPANY_NAME) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsePayPsw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countInvalidPwd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pwdStrength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payBaseKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPswType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{idType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emaill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realCheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update TB_USER

PAY_PSW = #{record.payPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_USE_PAY_PSW = #{record.isUsePayPsw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNT_INVALID_PWD = #{record.countInvalidPwd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

COMPANY_NAME = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PAY_PSW = #{payPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
